      • calculateSimilarityFromMatrix

        public static org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.CoordinateMatrix calculateSimilarityFromMatrix(org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix svdMatrix)
        CalSimilarityFromMatrix: Calculate term similarity from matrix.
        Parameters:
        svdMatrix. - Each row is corresponding to a term, and each column is corresponding to a dimension of feature
        Returns:
        CoordinateMatrix, each row is corresponding to a term, and each column is also a term, the cell value is the similarity between the two terms

      • calculateSimilarityFromVector

        public static org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.CoordinateMatrix calculateSimilarityFromVector(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector> vecs)
        CalSimilarityFromVector:Calculate term similarity from vector.
        Parameters:
        vecs - Each vector is corresponding to a term in the feature space.
        Returns:
        CoordinateMatrix, each row is corresponding to a term, and each column is also a term, the cell value is the similarity between the two terms

      • calculateSimilarityFromVector

        public static org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<LinkageTriple> calculateSimilarityFromVector(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaPairRDD<String,org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector> importRDD,
                                                                                             int simType)
        Calculate term similarity from vector.
        Parameters:
        importRDD - the JavaPairRDD data structure containing the vectors.
        simType - the similarity calculation to execute e.g.
        • SIM_COSINE - 3,
        • SIM_HELLINGER - 2,
        • SIM_PEARSON - 1
        Returns:
        a new JavaPairRDD

      • matrixToTriples

        public static List<LinkageTriple> matrixToTriples(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<String> keys,
                                                  org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.CoordinateMatrix simMatirx)
        MatrixtoTriples:Convert term similarity matrix to linkage triple list.
        Parameters:
        keys - each key is a term
        simMatirx - term similarity matrix, in which each row and column is a term and the cell value is the similarity between the two terms
        Returns:
        linkage triple list

      • hellingerDistance

        public static double hellingerDistance(org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector vecA,
                                       org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector vecB)
        Calculate similarity (Hellinger Distance) between vectors
        Parameters:
        vecA - initial vector from which to calculate a similarity
        vecB - second vector involved in similarity calculation
        Returns:
        similarity between two vectors
